titles.title: Conservation Innovation Act of 2023
Conservation Innovation Act of 2023
To create an Office of Conservation Innovation within the Natural Resources Conservation Service.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Research, and Biotechnology.

bill.summary:
Conservation Innovation Act of 2023
This bill directs the Department of Agriculture to establish an Office of Conservation Innovation within the Natural Resources Conservation Service. The office must encourage innovation in conservation practices through (1) revisions to existing conservation practice standards, and (2) recommendations for interim and new standards.
